entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
